FILE: cm365730v11.0.txt
DYAD: RUSSIA/USSR - KOREA
RIVALRY: RIV1012
DISPUTE(S): MID131 MID180 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180529
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180920

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

Pre-1900 MIDs: MID131 

MID180 

TERRMID: MID180 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID180 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID180 from Gibler 2018, this is the Russo-Japanese War in the early 20th century. Russia and Japan had claims in Manchuria and Korea. Russia began to push further into Korea, angering Japan. Japan demanded that Russia evacuate Manchuria and later declared war on Russia. Coded territorial MID because this was connected to territorial disputes in Manchuria and Japan, and Korea had a territorial dispute against Russia in Korea. 

TERRLINK: MID180 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID180 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID180 the Russo-Japanese War also involved a territorial dispute between Russia and Japan, outside this dyad. 

MARITMID: MID180 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID180 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID180 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID180 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID180 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID180 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID180 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID180 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID180 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID180 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID180 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID180 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
